author: jbellis
msg: read(bytes) doesn't automatically throw EOFException if it reads less than asked for, so we need to check for that.
patch by jbellis; reviewed by Sammy Yu for CASSANDRA-370

author: jbellis
msg: CASSANDRA-370 avoid opening multiple writers for the current file; the buffered nature of the global logWriter_ could cause problems
patch by jbellis; reviewed by Sammy Yu for CASSANDRA-370
